answerText: Shangri-La[10] The Tibetan paradise of Shangri-La features prominently in this novel.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Michigan A, MIT A | 20 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] Name this location discovered by some plane crash survivors including Mallinson and Miss Brinklow, as well as the World War I veteran Hugh Conway.
